title: "sasquatch pdf demo"
format: pdf
---

```{r}
devtools::load_all()
sas_connect()
```

```{sas}
proc print data = sashelp.cars(obs=10);
run;
```

```{sas}
proc model data=sashelp.cars;
    parms b0 b1 b2;
    MSRP = b0 + b1*Horsepower + b2*Weight;
    fit MSRP / outest=estimates;
run;
```
